disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: The following architectural plan is for informational purposes only and should be verified by a professional architect before implementation. I am not a licensed architect.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with sufficient natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living space designed for family gatherings, equipped with a central kitchenette.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with built-in storage and en-suite bathroom ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Kids' Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom for children, adjacent to the living area for easy supervision.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for occasional guests and extra storage.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Separate bathroom with modern fixtures and efficient ventilation.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large windows ensuring ample sunlight and ventilation in living areas.
Window to balance eastern light as per Vastu recommendations.
Door leading directly to the central courtyard for garden access and natural light.

disclaimer_end: Disclaimer: The design is an idealized concept. For construction, please consult a licensed architect to ensure compliance with local building codes and regulations.
